title: Output contract: explicit ball detection/track schemas and examples
scope: Make ball-specific detection and tracking semantics explicit in the output contract template.
Include required fields, enums, reasons, and minimal examples aligned with code validation rules.
Reduce ambiguity between generic TrackRecordV1 and ball-specific trust-first rules.
acceptance: Contract template contains dedicated sections for: (a) ball detections, (b) ball tracks, (c) ball missing/unknown semantics with reasons.
Examples shown in the contract pass `validate_track_record_v1` and follow segment/break semantics where required.
`npm run generate` produces docs reflecting the ball schema sections deterministically.

deliverables.title: Contract template extended with ball detection + tracking sections
acceptance: Ball-specific schema and examples are included, and examples are compatible with code validation rules.
Enumerations and vocabularies are documented and stable.
evidence: `npm run generate` and `npm run guardrails` pass.
